nodes.text: This armband was discovered to have had the words, "For M Vao. - Z", coarsely engraved upon it. Upon further investigation, the item appeared to have had the ability to augment the wearer's nervous system, resulting in a greater degree of dexterous movement. It is believed that the Jedi Exile may have acquired this article sometime during her travels in 3951 BBY.

Clearly, this armband was given as a gift to Mission Vao by her best friend the Wookiee Zaalbar. Both of these characters were encountered in the first KotOR, and it is unclear if Obsidian Entertainment, the developers of  TSL, attached any particular significance to this item.
